Guides
======

The goal of this page is to provide a step-by-step guide for setting up and configuring a web crawler, including creating a new website parser and adding a message queue handler.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    Setup the Web Crawler <howto/web_crawler_setup>
    Update the Documentation <howto/update_docs>
    Create a new Website Parser <howto/create_parser>
